name: HELI-COMMANDO 2021 - DEMO - Hunt for the princess
name_original: HELI-COMMANDO 2021 - DEMO - Hunt for the princess
description:
It's time for a new challenge in flying a helicopter and rescueing the princess.HELI-COMMANDO 2021 ist a retro game like the games from the 80s. Flying a helicopter to collect a lot of things, being careful not to crash in any wall or other moving things that threat your flight starting at the base Platform and to have enough fuel to fly your next way to the landing platform. You have to collect 3 Keys to gain access to the landing platform, if you try to land without all this 3 keys collected there will be a popup that keys are missing and you will have to find them all first. There are a lot of things to collect like stars, gold chest, pumpkins, cats, mens and many more.although there are some secrets you will have to find out. you will always have to watch your fuel, if your fuel display is only 30 % left then an alarm will sound and you should quick search for a fuel station to refill your fuel tank.if you are not fast enough to refill your tank then the helicopter will go down and crashes losing one life.if you lose all your 3 lives then there is a highscore entry list which will automatically appear if your score is high enough to get a rank in the highscores. 

Playing: Use Gamepad or Keyboard.
Music  : in the demo the music is shortended and only the start is included.
Levels  : the demo includes 3 Levels to play and master.

Release: Coming soon
